    "# KNN-Shapley Explainer Demo\n",
    "\n",
    "**In diesem Notebook demonstriere ich:**\n",
    "\n",
    "1. **Basic (unweighted) KNN-Shapley**  \n",
    "2. **Weighted KNN-Shapley** (exakt vs. approx)  \n",
    "3. **Vergleich beider Methoden**\n",
    "\n",

    "\n",

    "3. [Weighted KNN-Shapley](#weighted-knn-shapley)  \n",
    "4. [Gegen√ºberstellung](#gegen√ºberstellung)  \n",
    "5. [Benchmark & Genauigkeit](#benchmark--genauigkeit)  \n",
    "6. [Fazit](#fazit)\n",
    "\n",
    "</details>\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 116,
   "id": "1ea44e4e-1029-4b53-9f3c-21536ad01e4c",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#Vorbereitung & Imports\n",
    "import sys, os\n",
    "proj_root = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(os.getcwd(), \"..\"))\n",
    "if proj_root not in sys.path:\n",
    "    sys.path.insert(0, proj_root)\n",
    "\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "from shapiq_student.basic_knn_explainer import KNNExplainer as BasicKNNExplainer\n",
    "from shapiq_student.weighted_knn_explainer import KNNExplainer as WeightedKNNExplainer"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "31ab85ed-b8a1-4787-b0fb-e24129304db9",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Datensatz erstellen\n",
    "\n",
    "Ich nutze einen kleinen 1D-Datensatz, um die Shapley-Werte klar zu visualisieren:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 117,
   "id": "7eb2a9e8-df72-4e27-93a2-b0174487d5d5",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#1D-Datensatz\n",
    "X      = np.array([[0.1], [0.4], [0.6], [0.9]])\n",
    "y      = np.array([0,     0,     1,     1   ])\n",
    "x_test = np.array([[0.5]])\n",
    "y_test = np.array([1])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "930192ca-681c-48a3-a265-cd43eb8b6514",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 1. Gewichtung im KNN-Shapley\n",
    "\n",
    "Beim **Basic Explainer** (`weights=\"uniform\"`) z√§hlen die K n√§chsten Nachbarn jeweils gleich stark:\n",
    "$$\n",
    "w_i = 1\n",
    "$$\n",
    "\n",
    "Im **Weighted Explainer** (`weights=\"distance\"`) flie√üt stattdessen die umgekehrte Distanz ins Gewicht:\n",
    "$$\n",
    "w_i = \\frac{1}{d(x_i, x_{\\mathrm{test}}) + \\varepsilon}\n",
    "$$\n",
    "\n",
    "Dabei sorgt ein kleiner Epsilon-Term daf√ºr, dass die Division durch Null vermieden wird.\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "64e663a9-6956-4da7-99ce-0ea1db2a0c2a",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 1Ô∏è Basic KNN-Shapley\n",
    "\n",
    "Hier verwende ich uniforme Gewichte (`weights=\"uniform\"`) und berechne die exakten Shapley-Werte."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 118,
   "id": "e4e30dcf-9d88-4f16-b92a-ad7f37eca6c2",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Basic œÜ: [-0.08333333 -0.08333333  0.41666667  0.25      ]\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "# Zelle 3: Basic Explainer mit explain()\n",
    "model_b    = KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors=2, weights=\"uniform\").fit(X, y)\n",
    "expl_basic = BasicKNNExplainer(model_b, X, y, class_index=1)\n",
    "\n",
    "iv_basic   = expl_basic.explain(x_test)   \n",
    "phi_basic  = iv_basic.values              \n",
    "\n",
    "print(\"Basic œÜ:\", phi_basic)\n",
    "\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "d0a496dd-406f-4e99-b5ca-6dc70873315d",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Visualisierung der Basic-Werte:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 119,
   "id": "758a2bbf-57cd-4c79-850b-1070898fbb8d",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 600x300 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Basic Visualisierung\n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))\n",
    "plt.scatter(X[:,0], y,        c=y,      cmap=\"coolwarm\", s=100, label=\"Trainingsdaten\")\n",
    "plt.scatter(x_test,  y_test,  marker=\"*\", c=\"gold\", s=200, label=\"Testpunkt\")\n",
    "for i, v in enumerate(phi_basic):\n",
    "    plt.text(X[i,0], y[i]+0.05, f\"{v:.2f}\", ha=\"center\")\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.title(\"Basic KNN-Shapley (uniform)\")\n",
    "plt.ylim(-0.1,1.4)\n",
    "plt.legend(); plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "4f832420-1440-4ea5-b74e-7daa8885dc44",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 2Ô∏è Weighted KNN-Shapley\n",
    "\n",
    "Nun: `weights=\"distance\"`. Zuerst zeige ich den exakten und dann den approximierten Shapley-Score.\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "2fc841f8-b456-4421-860b-5879575acedf",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 2. Warum Approximation? (Laufzeit vs. Genauigkeit)\n",
    "\n",
    "Die **genaue** Berechnung aller Shapley-Werte braucht extrem viel Aufwand, weil man alle m√∂glichen Gruppen durchprobieren muss. Bei $N$ Merkmalen sind das $2^N$ Kombinationen. Das funktioniert in der Praxis nur, wenn der Datensatz sehr klein ist.\n",
    "\n",
    "Die **DP-Approximation** (dynamic programming) schr√§nkt stattdessen auf Teilmengen der Gr√∂√üe bis \\(K\\) (und ggf. nur auf die ersten \\(M\\)) ein.  \n",
    "\n",
    "Damit reduziert sich der Aufwand auf etwa\n",
    "\n",
    "$$\n",
    "O\\bigl(M \\cdot K \\cdot \\binom{N}{K}\\bigr)\n",
    "$$\n",
    "\n",
    "und l√§sst sich f√ºr gr√∂√üere Datens√§tze oder mehrdimensionale Features effizient einsetzen.  \n",
    "Der Trade-off: etwas Genauigkeit gegen deutlich geringere Laufzeit.\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 120,
   "id": "3259afbb-1ce7-4936-9a9b-673a8402f809",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Weighted exact œÜ : [-0.08333333 -0.58333333  0.41666667  0.25      ]\n",
      "Weighted approx œÜ: [-0.25       -0.33333333  0.16666667  0.08333333]\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Zelle 5: Weighted Explainer mit den korrekten Methoden\n",
    "model_w     = KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors=2, weights=\"distance\").fit(X, y)\n",
    "expl_w      = WeightedKNNExplainer(\n",
    "    model_w, X, y, class_index=1,\n",
    "    approx_M=None    # None = exakt; f√ºr approx: approx_M=int(np.sqrt(len(X)))\n",
    ")\n",
    "\n",
    "# exakte Shapley-Werte\n",
    "phi_w_exact  = expl_w.compute_exact_by_enumeration(x_test[0])\n",
    "\n",
    "# approximative Shapley-Werte\n",
    "phi_w_approx = expl_w._compute_wknn_shapley_dp(x_test[0])\n",
    "\n",
    "print(\"Weighted exact œÜ :\", phi_w_exact)\n",
    "print(\"Weighted approx œÜ:\", phi_w_approx)\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "33394e29-5f12-48aa-8cff-764993f8351d",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Und so sehen die Werte im direkten Vergleich aus:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 121,
   "id": "994ef297-09ee-4784-97fb-2613265597d5",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 600x300 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Weighted Visualisierung\n",
    "width = 0.2\n",
    "idx   = np.arange(len(X))\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))\n",
    "plt.scatter(X[:,0], y,        c=y,      cmap=\"coolwarm\", s=100)\n",
    "plt.scatter(x_test,  y_test,  marker=\"*\", c=\"gold\", s=200)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.bar(idx - width/2, phi_w_exact,  width, label=\"exact\")\n",
    "plt.bar(idx + width/2, phi_w_approx, width, label=\"approx\")\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xticks(idx, [f\"{x[0]:.1f}\" for x in X])\n",
    "plt.title(\"Weighted KNN-Shapley (exakt vs. approx)\")\n",
    "plt.ylim(-0.1,1.4)\n",
    "plt.legend(); plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "cb88b756-842a-4e14-afab-c7003bd6c574",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 3. Interpretation der Shapley-Werte\n",
    "\n",
    "- **Basic (uniform)**  \n",
    "  - Der Punkt bei 0.6 tr√§gt mit ‚âà 0.42 am st√§rksten zur korrekten Klassifikation bei.  \n",
    "  - Die Punkte bei 0.1 und 0.4 haben negative Werte, da sie im Mittel die Entscheidung eher ‚Äûfalsch‚Äú beeinflussen.\n",
    "\n",
    "- **Weighted exact (distance)**  \n",
    "  - Der n√§chstgelegene Punkt (0.4) erh√§lt nun den st√§rksten Einfluss, weil er den h√∂chsten Gewichtungs-Wert hat.  \n",
    "  - Weiter entfernte Punkte werden entsprechend abgeschw√§cht.\n",
    "\n",
    "- **Weighted approx**  \n",
    "  - Die approximative Methode f√§ngt den Trend der exakten Werte ein, untersch√§tzt aber tendenziell den Betrag.  \n",
    "  - Mit gr√∂√üerem `approx_M` n√§hert sich die Approx-Variante immer weiter an die exakte Verteilung an, auf Kosten h√∂herer Rechenzeit.\n",
    "\n",
    "Zusammengefasst zeigt der Vergleich, wie Uniform- vs. Distanz-Gewichtung und Approximation die Verteilung der Shapley-Beitr√§ge ver√§ndern und so lokale Einfl√ºsse im KNN-Modell sichtbar werden.\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "022b6f30-5348-42c3-8c3e-2a695c911ea7",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 3Ô∏è Vergleich Basic vs. Weighted\n",
    "\n",
    "Gegen√ºberstellung beider Methoden:\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 122,
   "id": "6b826a14-7b2a-4311-bb18-f55e0a7cb236",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 600x300 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    " #Gegen√ºberstellung\n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))\n",
    "plt.bar(idx - width/2, phi_basic,   width, label=\"Basic\")\n",
    "plt.bar(idx + width/2, phi_w_exact, width, label=\"Weighted exact\")\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xticks(idx, [f\"{x[0]:.1f}\" for x in X])\n",
    "plt.title(\"Basic vs. Weighted KNN-Shapley\")\n",
    "plt.ylim(-0.1,1.4)\n",
    "plt.legend(); plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "c71c523b-81af-460f-ae54-0014d2047fe6",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 4. Performance-Benchmark\n",
    "\n",
    "-> mittlere Laufzeit der **exakten** Shapley-Berechnung messen gegen√ºber der **DP-Approximation** auf dem 1D-Beispiel, um den Trade-off zwischen  Genauigkeit und Performance zu bestimmen.\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 123,
   "id": "ec131ba9-5a53-447b-8a4d-4a371008e9c3",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 500x300 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Methode  Sekunden pro Lauf\n",
      "  exakt           0.499386\n",
      " approx           0.007479\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "import timeit\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "def bench_exact():\n",
    "    expl = WeightedKNNExplainer(model_w, X, y, class_index=1, K=2, approx_M=None)\n",
    "    expl.compute_exact_by_enumeration(x_test[0])\n",
    "\n",
    "def bench_approx():\n",
    "    expl = WeightedKNNExplainer(model_w, X, y, class_index=1, K=2, approx_M=2)\n",
    "    expl._compute_wknn_shapley_dp(x_test[0])\n",
    "\n",
    "N = 30\n",
    "t_ex = timeit.timeit(bench_exact, number=N) / N\n",
    "t_ap = timeit.timeit(bench_approx, number=N) / N\n",
    "\n",
    "df = pd.DataFrame({\n",
    "    \"Methode\": [\"exakt\", \"approx\"],\n",
    "    \"Sekunden pro Lauf\": [t_ex, t_ap]\n",
    "})\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(5,3))\n",
    "plt.bar(df[\"Methode\"], df[\"Sekunden pro Lauf\"])\n",
    "plt.title(\"Durchschnittliche Laufzeit: exact vs. approx\")\n",
    "plt.ylabel(\"Sekunden pro Lauf\")\n",
    "plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "print(df.to_string(index=False))\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "1b29e149-7cd2-4ac4-a88c-987021a478ec",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 5. Genauigkeitsvergleich: exakte vs. DP-Approximation\n",
    "\n",
    "In diesem Abschnitt vergleiche ich die **exakten** Shapley-Werte mit denen der DP-Approximation  \n",
    "f√ºr verschiedene Werte von `approx_M`. Die exakte Berechnung hat per Definition einen L‚ÇÇ-Fehler von 0.  \n",
    "Deshalb stelle ich f√ºr jede Approximation den Abstand zu den exakten Werten in einem Balkendiagramm dar,  \n",
    "um zu sehen, wie sich die Genauigkeit mit wachsender Stichprobengr√∂√üe \\(M\\) verbessert.\n",
    "\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 124,
   "id": "f6c079bc-4853-4688-9108-7a7fadeebb5b",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 600x300 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "  Variante  L2-Fehler\n",
      "     exakt   0.000000\n",
      "approx_M=1   0.527046\n",
      "approx_M=2   0.478714\n",
      "approx_M=4   0.424918\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "\n",
    "# 1) Exakte Shapley-Werte einmal berechnen\n",
    "expl_base   = WeightedKNNExplainer(model_w, X, y, class_index=1, K=2, approx_M=None)\n",
    "exact_vals  = expl_base.compute_exact_by_enumeration(x_test[0])\n",
    "\n",
    "# 2) F√ºr verschiedene approx_M die DP-Approximation ausf√ºhren\n",
    "Ms      = [1, 2, len(X)]\n",
    "errors  = []\n",
    "for M in Ms:\n",
    "    expl_M      = WeightedKNNExplainer(model_w, X, y, class_index=1, K=2, approx_M=M)\n",
    "    approx_vals = expl_M._compute_wknn_shapley_dp(x_test[0])\n",
    "    errors.append(np.linalg.norm(approx_vals - exact_vals))\n",
    "\n",
    "# 3) DataFrame mit exakter und approx-Werten\n",
    "df_err = pd.DataFrame({\n",
    "    \"Variante\":   [\"exakt\"] + [f\"approx_M={M}\" for M in Ms],\n",
    "    \"L2-Fehler\":  [0.0]   + errors\n",
    "})\n",
    "\n",
    "# 4) Balkendiagramm\n",
    "plt.figure(figsize=(6,3))\n",
    "plt.bar(df_err[\"Variante\"], df_err[\"L2-Fehler\"])\n",
    "plt.title(\"Genauigkeitsvergleich: exakte vs. DP-Approximation\")\n",
    "plt.ylabel(\"L2-Fehler gegen√ºber exakten Werten\")\n",
    "plt.xticks(rotation=30)\n",
    "plt.ylim(0, df_err[\"L2-Fehler\"].max() * 1.1)\n",
    "plt.show()\n",
    "\n",
    "# 5) Tabellarische Ausgabe\n",
    "print(df_err.to_string(index=False))\n",
    "\n"
   ]
  },
